english.segment1: What can wash away my sin?. Nothing but the blood of Jesus. What can make me whole again?. Nothing but the blood of Jesus
english.segment2: Come to us, Lord. You reward those who earnestly, diligently seek You. I wanna see Your face, I wanna know Your way. Come to us, Lord
english.segment3: We want You more than this life. More than our way Your way is higher. Your thoughts are higher. We surrender here tonight
english.segment4: What can wash away my sin?. Nothing but the blood of Jesus. What can make me whole again?. Nothing but the blood of Jesus
english.segment5: Oh, precious is the flow. That makes me white as snow. No other fount I know. Nothing but the blood of Jesus
english.segment6: Oh, precious is the flow. That makes me white as snow. No other fount I know. Nothing but the blood of Jesus. Nothing but the blood of Jesus
